title: Bayesian inference for spatio-temporal hidden Markov models using the exchange algorithm
summary: This work proposes a spatio-temporal hidden Markov model where the latent process is an extension of the autologistic model, addressing the difficulty of estimating spatio-temporal hidden Markov models due to their latent joint distributions being available only in trivial cases.
usefulness_reason: The title explicitly mentions "spatio-temporal hidden Markov models" and the summary further elaborates on the challenges and proposed solutions for these models. This is a direct and substantial match for the "Spatio Temporal" aspect of the query.
